title: Exptl Reactor Physics
description: Introduction to experimental nuclear reactor physics techniques including criticality, flux mapping, buckling measurements, subcritical assembly measurements, diffusion length measurement, neutron spectral measurements, and foil activation methods.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: NRE 3208 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and NRE 3112 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
